welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bishops Cleeve, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our lovely town has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gloucestershire Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
